may make and construct this pattern and sell what you make from this pattern but you may not sell or give away the pattern itself page 1 of 7 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com puppy dog tapester pattern pattern difficulty medium i assume you already know how to crochet how to crochet in the round how to read a pattern and how to sew pieces together supplies  size g hook  worsted weight yarn red heart super saver works nicely o blue o or the color of your choice o black for details in embroidering  a tape measurer 2 ¼ diameter  sew-on google eyes optional gauge will be important because you need to make sure your tape measurer fits inside your circle my base circle of 5 rounds and 30 stitches measured 2 ¼ inches across using a g hook which also the width my tape measurer terms single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase two single_crochet in same stitch decrease = decrease crochet two stitches together blo = back loops only note this critter is worked in the round i usually crochet in the round by joining each round with a slip_stitch and chaining 1 to start the next round in this project i recommend that you work in spirals instead of rounds at least for the front and back pieces to avoid having a seam which in this case will be more noticeable than usual remember to use a stitch marker or piece of contrasting yarn so you know where each round ends and begins to start each piece you can chain 2 and work your 6 stitches into the 2nd stitch from the hook or you can use the magic_ring be creative and have fun page 2 of 7 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com back and sides row instruction stitches using blue 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook place marker and start your 6 next round in the first single_crochet from this round 2 *2 single_crochet in each single_crochet* around 12 3 *single_crochet in next 1 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet* around 18 4 *single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet* around 24 *single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet* around slip_stitch to the next stitch and chain 1 5 30 hold this piece up to your tape measurer now and make sure your gauge is right and the piece the same size as the tm 6 in blo single_crochet in each stitch around up to the last stitch do not join 29 to make the opening for the tape measure 7 29 chain 1 t single_crochet in each single_crochet around working in both loops again bind off and weave in your tail front / face
